name: Darkness (Assasine399)
description:
Darkness Is a Simple Rpg-Horror Game Where You Have To Complete 2 Main Missions And Then You Can Try The Survival Mode (There are Just 2 Maps In The Survival Mode For Now But  There Will Be More) Also The Game Will Receive More Updates With More Content Like Maps,Game Modes,Etc.

(Is Recommended Play The Game With Headphones)
